channel.title: File Formats on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in File Formats on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Pretty Darn Fascinating
item.description: Today in Tedium: Every once of our file formats has a story. The GIF, for example, came to being thanks to a need to serve up images on pokey Compuserve connections with limited RAM. The MP3, meanwhile, was built around the contours of Suzanne Vega’s unaccompanied voice on “Tom’s Diner.” And the ZIP file came to life in a brutal legal battle that was egged on by the whims of BBS users.
